page.title: ServerlessDays Cardiff - Carl Austin
page.description: Serverless is the saving grace of the data lake, projects known for high rates of failure. We will talk you through a successful production data lake delivery for a UK bank using Azure serverless capabilities to not only succeed but deliver in a matter of months.

speaker.name: Carl Austin
speaker.title: UK CTO for BJSS
speaker.bio: As BJSSâ€™s UK CTO, Carl is a passionate technologist. His specialism is in data, analytics and distributed systems, a field in which he has worked from the outset of his career.

talk.title: Building a serverless data lake in Azure
talk.abstract: Serverless is the saving grace of the data lake, projects known for high rates of failure. We will talk you through a successful production data lake delivery for a UK bank using Azure serverless capabilities to not only succeed but deliver in a matter of months.
